ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Proposal to change how bard haste songs stack with enchanter/sham an haste spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Hally/Tani wrote: ...bards go through their bad, weak period very early - say around levels 9-22... Heh, and I m at the peak of the bad, week period.  This
ygData.messageBody:
Hally/Tani wrote:
...bards go through
their "bad, weak period" very early - say around levels 9-22...

Heh, and I'm at the peak of the bad, week period. This level I got
Cataloging Libretto! Woohoo! Next level I get Lullaby!! Woohoo!! ;^)

But in truth, I'm still quite happy playing my bard. I played a rogue when
rogues were beyond jokes. If bards ever sank that low, I'd probably still
be happy playing my bard.

Evulia, eternal newbie of Tunare
